diff_analysis.evidence: In the OLD code, the video-embed plugin directly interpolated unvalidated data-youtube, data-vimeo, and parameter attributes (data-ytparams, data-vimeoparams) into iframe src URLs without any validation. An attacker controlling these attributes could inject arbitrary characters into the iframe src, potentially enabling XSS in some embedding contexts. The NEW code introduces a strict validation regex (regValidParam) and aborts if IDs or params do not match it, mitigating this injection risk.
